item.description:
Oh thank Beerness it's Sunday again!

So hopefully no one will get this meetup location confused with the Sturbridge Publick House. Not that I have any beef with Yankees, I'm just saying.

OK Info: 36 Taps 150 Bottles, good food...little pricey, but we can all share

I hate to be this person, BUT I'm actually going to put a cap at 22 people. I've never eaten inside but everyone on meet-up says group of 25 max. We all know we tend to multiply as the night goes on. I love it! but I want to make sure we can all atleast be close. Eh, we'll just go with the (beer)flow. If anyone knows better, fill me in and I will gladly remove the cap.

There's no website but here's the BA's A-approval .

Well I'm excited to see/meet everyone again/for the first time! Yay Beer, Food & Friends!!
item.how_to_find_us: Find me outside @ 5. I will have a home-made 'BEER MEET UP' sign on my bag!
item.name: Sunday Funday @ Publick House & Monk's Cell
